param.label: [Galaxy Tool Development] Cores
param.name: ntasks
param.help: Option ignored for unauthorized users. Value will be capped for the resource on which the tool runs. Use '0' for default.

param.label: [Galaxy Tool Development] Memory (GB)
param.name: mem
param.help: Option ignored for unauthorized users. Value will be capped for the resource on which the tool runs. Use '0' for default.

param.label: [Galaxy Tool Development] Time Limit
param.name: time
param.help: Maximum job time in hours, ('walltime' value). Value will be capped for the resource on which the tool runs. Max of 36 for most resources, 2 for test partitions. Shorter limit = runs sooner. Use '0' for default.
